english.definition: The occurrence and development of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way.
english.example: The discovery of penicillin was a fortunate act of serendipity.

french.definition: Le fait de faire des découvertes heureuses par hasard.
french.example: La découverte de la pénicilline fut un acte de sérendipité.

spanish.definition: Hallazgo afortunado e inesperado que se produce cuando se está buscando otra cosa.
spanish.example: El descubrimiento de la penicilina fue un acto de serendipia.

korean.example: 페니실린의 발견은 뜻밖의 발견이었다.

english.definition: Lasting for a very short time.
english.example: Fashion trends are often ephemeral.

french.definition: Qui ne dure qu'un temps très court.
french.example: Les tendances de la mode sont souvent éphémères.

spanish.definition: Que dura por muy poco tiempo.
spanish.example: Las tendencias de la moda son a menudo efímeras.

korean.example: 패션 트렌드는 흔히 덧없다.

english.definition: Present, appearing, or found everywhere.
english.example: Smartphones have become ubiquitous in modern society.

french.definition: Présent partout à la fois.
french.example: Les smartphones sont devenus omniprésents dans la société moderne.

spanish.definition: Que está presente en todas partes al mismo tiempo.
spanish.example: Los smartphones se han vuelto ubicuos en la sociedad moderna.

korean.example: 스마트폰은 현대 사회에서 어디에나 있게 되었다.

english.definition: (Of a voice or words) sweet or musical; pleasant to hear.
english.example: Her mellifluous voice captivated the audience.

french.definition: (De la voix ou des mots) doux ou musical; agréable à entendre.
french.example: Sa voix melliflue a captivé l'auditoire.

spanish.definition: (De una voz o palabras) dulce o musical; agradable al oído.
spanish.example: Su voz meliflua cautivó a la audiencia.

korean.example: 그녀의 감미로운 목소리는 청중을 사로잡았다.

english.definition: A harsh, discordant mixture of sounds.
english.example: A cacophony of car horns echoed through the city streets.

french.definition: Mélange de sons rudes et discordants.
french.example: Une cacophonie de klaxons résonnait dans les rues de la ville.

spanish.definition: Mezcla de sonidos duros y discordantes.
spanish.example: Una cacofonía de bocinas de coches resonaba por las calles de la ciudad.

korean.example: 도시의 거리에는 자동차 경적 소리의 불협화음이 울려 퍼졌다.

english.definition: Well meaning and kindly.
english.example: The benevolent queen was loved by all her subjects.

french.definition: Qui veut du bien et agit avec gentillesse.
french.example: La reine bienveillante était aimée de tous ses sujets.

spanish.definition: Que tiene buena voluntad y amabilidad.
spanish.example: La reina benévola era amada por todos sus súbditos.

korean.example: 그 자비로운 여왕은 모든 백성에게 사랑받았다.

english.definition: A peculiarity of constitution or temperament; an eccentricity.
english.example: One of his idiosyncrasies was his habit of always wearing odd socks.

french.definition: Particularité de la constitution ou du tempérament; une excentricité.
french.example: Une de ses idiosyncrasies était son habitude de toujours porter des chaussettes dépareillées.

spanish.definition: Peculiaridad de la constitución o del temperamento; una excentricidad.
spanish.example: Una de sus idiosincrasias era su costumbre de llevar siempre calcetines impares.

korean.example: 그의 특이한 버릇 중 하나는 항상 짝짝이 양말을 신는 것이었다.

english.definition: Wicked or criminal.
english.example: The police caught the nefarious criminals plotting a bank robbery.

french.definition: Mauvais ou criminel.
french.example: La police a attrapé les criminels néfastes complotant un vol de banque.

spanish.definition: Malvado o criminal.
spanish.example: La policía atrapó a los criminales nefarios planeando un robo a un banco.

korean.example: 경찰은 은행 강도를 계획하던 사악한 범죄자들을 붙잡았다.

english.definition: Having a harmful effect, especially in a gradual or subtle way.
english.example: The pernicious influence of social media on mental health is a growing concern.

french.definition: Ayant un effet nuisible, surtout de manière graduelle ou subtile.
french.example: L'influence pernicieuse des médias sociaux sur la santé mentale est une préoccupation croissante.

spanish.definition: Que causa gran daño o perjuicio, especialmente de manera gradual o sutil.
spanish.example: La influencia perniciosa de las redes sociales en la salud mental es una preocupación creciente.

korean.definition: 특히 점진적이거나 미묘한 방식으로 해로운 영향을 미치는.
korean.example: 소셜 미디어가 정신 건강에 미치는 유해한 영향은 증가하는 우려이다.

english.definition: Showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise.
english.example: She was meticulous in her research, checking every single source.

french.definition: Qui montre une grande attention aux détails; très attentif et précis.
french.example: Elle était méticuleuse dans ses recherches, vérifiant chaque source.

spanish.definition: Que muestra gran atención a los detalles; muy cuidadoso y preciso.
spanish.example: Ella fue meticulosa en su investigación, revisando cada fuente.

korean.definition: 세부 사항에 큰 주의를 기울이는; 매우 신중하고 정확한.
korean.example: 그녀는 모든 자료를 확인하며 연구에 꼼꼼했다.

french.definition: Disposition favorable à l'égard de quelqu'un ou de quelque chose.
french.example: Elle a accueilli tout le monde avec une grande bienveillance.

english.definition: A favorable disposition towards someone or something.
english.example: She welcomed everyone with great kindness.

spanish.definition: Disposición favorable hacia alguien o algo.
spanish.example: Ella recibió a todos con gran benevolencia.

korean.definition: 누군가 또는 무언가에 대한 호의적인 태도.
korean.example: 그녀는 모두를 큰 친절로 맞이했다.

french.definition: Développement heureux et complet (d'une personne, d'une faculté).
french.example: Le sport contribue à son épanouissement personnel.

english.definition: Happy and complete development (of a person, a faculty).
english.example: Sports contribute to his personal fulfillment.

spanish.definition: Desarrollo feliz y completo (de una persona, una facultad).
spanish.example: El deporte contribuye a su realización personal.

korean.example: 스포츠는 그의 개인적인 성장에 기여한다.

french.definition: Qu'on ne peut saisir, retenir, comprendre.
french.example: Son charme était insaisissable et mystérieux.

english.definition: That which cannot be grasped, held, or understood.
english.example: Her charm was elusive and mysterious.

spanish.definition: Que no se puede asir, retener o comprender.
spanish.example: Su encanto era inasible y misterioso.

korean.example: 그녀의 매력은 파악하기 어렵고 신비로웠다.

french.definition: Qui dépayse, fait ressentir un changement d'ambiance, de cadre.
french.example: Voyager dans ce pays fut une expérience très dépaysante.

english.definition: That which changes one's usual surroundings, giving a feeling of being in a foreign place.
english.example: Traveling to this country was a very exotic experience.

spanish.definition: Que cambia el ambiente o el entorno habitual.
spanish.example: Viajar a este país fue una experiencia muy exótica.

korean.definition: 분위기나 환경의 변화를 느끼게 하여 낯설게 하는.
korean.example: 이 나라로 여행하는 것은 매우 이국적인 경험이었다.

french.definition: Caractère de ce qui est convivial, agréable à vivre.
french.example: L'ambiance du restaurant était pleine de convivialité.

english.definition: The quality of being friendly, lively, and enjoyable.
english.example: The atmosphere of the restaurant was full of conviviality.

spanish.definition: Carácter de lo que es amigable y agradable para vivir.
spanish.example: El ambiente del restaurante estaba lleno de convivialidad.

korean.example: 그 레스토랑의 분위기는 친목으로 가득했다.

french.definition: Plate-forme aménagée pour l'atterrissage et le décollage d'hélicoptères.
french.example: L'hôpital a un héliport sur le toit pour les urgences.

english.definition: A landing and take-off platform for helicopters.
english.example: The hospital has a heliport on the roof for emergencies.

spanish.definition: Plataforma acondicionada para el aterrizaje y despegue de helicópteros.
spanish.example: El hospital tiene un helipuerto en el tejado para emergencias.

korean.example: 병원은 응급 상황을 위해 옥상에 헬기장을 갖추고 있다.

french.definition: Événement inattendu qui modifie le cours d'une action, d'une situation.
french.example: Le voyage fut plein de péripéties, mais nous sommes arrivés sains et saufs.

english.definition: An unexpected event that alters the course of an action or situation.
english.example: The journey was full of twists and turns, but we arrived safe and sound.

spanish.definition: Evento inesperado que modifica el curso de una acción o situación.
spanish.example: El viaje estuvo lleno de peripecias, pero llegamos sanos y salvos.

korean.definition: 행동이나 상황의 흐름을 바꾸는 예상치 못한 사건.
korean.example: 여행은 예상치 못한 사건들로 가득했지만, 우리는 무사히 도착했다.

french.definition: Qui se fait, arrive tous les jours; la vie de tous les jours.
french.example: Lire un livre est une partie essentielle de son quotidien.

english.definition: That which happens every day; everyday life.
english.example: Reading a book is an essential part of his daily routine.

spanish.definition: Que se hace o sucede todos los días; la vida diaria.
spanish.example: Leer un libro es una parte esencial de su vida cotidiana.

korean.definition: 매일 일어나거나 하는 것; 매일의 삶.
korean.example: 책을 읽는 것은 그의 일상에서 중요한 부분이다.

french.definition: Attitude de préoccupation attentive et affectueuse envers quelqu'un.
french.example: Elle a montré une grande sollicitude envers ses parents âgés.

english.definition: An attitude of attentive and affectionate concern towards someone.
english.example: She showed great solicitude towards her elderly parents.

spanish.definition: Actitud de preocupación atenta y afectuosa hacia alguien.
spanish.example: Mostró gran solicitud hacia sus padres ancianos.

korean.definition: 누군가에 대한 세심하고 애정 어린 관심의 태도.
korean.example: 그녀는 나이든 부모님에게 큰 배려를 보였다.

french.definition: Qui est échangé entre deux personnes ou deux groupes; mutuel.
french.example: Leur amitié était basée sur un respect réciproque.

english.definition: That which is exchanged between two people or groups; mutual.
english.example: Their friendship was based on reciprocal respect.

spanish.definition: Que es intercambiado entre dos personas o dos grupos; mutuo.
spanish.example: Su amistad se basaba en el respeto recíproco.

korean.definition: 두 사람 또는 두 그룹 사이에 교환되는; 상호적인.
korean.example: 그들의 우정은 상호적인 존중에 기반을 두었다.

spanish.definition: Capacidad de adaptarse positivamente a situaciones adversas.
spanish.example: Su resiliencia le permitió superar grandes dificultades.

english.definition: The capacity to recover quickly from difficulties; toughness.
english.example: Her resilience allowed her to overcome great difficulties.

french.definition: Capacité à s'adapter positivement aux situations difficiles.
french.example: Sa résilience lui a permis de surmonter de grandes difficultés.

korean.example: 그녀의 회복력은 큰 어려움을 극복하게 해주었다.

spanish.definition: Que produce el efecto esperado; que funciona bien.
spanish.example: Este método es muy eficaz para aprender idiomas.

english.definition: Producing the desired or intended result.
english.example: This method is very effective for learning languages.

french.definition: Qui produit l'effet attendu; qui fonctionne bien.
french.example: Cette méthode est très efficace pour apprendre des langues.

korean.example: 이 방법은 언어 학습에 매우 효과적이다.

spanish.definition: Sentimiento de tristeza o melancolía causado por la ausencia o la pérdida de algo o alguien.
spanish.example: Sentía una profunda añoranza por su país natal.

english.definition: A feeling of sadness or melancholy caused by the absence or loss of something or someone.
english.example: He felt a deep longing for his homeland.

french.definition: Sentiment de tristesse ou de mélancolie causé par l'absence ou la perte de quelque chose ou quelqu'un.
french.example: Il ressentait une profonde nostalgie de son pays natal.

korean.definition: 어떤 것 또는 누군가의 부재나 상실로 인한 슬픔이나 우울함.
korean.example: 그는 고향에 대한 깊은 향수를 느꼈다.

spanish.definition: Capacidad de comprender y compartir los sentimientos de otro.
spanish.example: Su empatía le permitió conectar fácilmente con los demás.

english.definition: The ability to understand and share the feelings of another.
english.example: Her empathy allowed her to easily connect with others.

french.definition: Capacité à comprendre et à partager les sentiments d'autrui.
french.example: Son empathie lui a permis de se connecter facilement avec les autres.

korean.example: 그녀의 공감 능력은 다른 사람들과 쉽게 소통할 수 있게 해주었다.

spanish.definition: Que dura por muy poco tiempo.
spanish.example: La belleza de las flores es efímera.

english.definition: Lasting for a very short time.
english.example: The beauty of flowers is ephemeral.

french.definition: Qui ne dure qu'un temps très court.
french.example: La beauté des fleurs est éphémère.

korean.example: 꽃의 아름다움은 덧없다.

spanish.definition: Que se puede mantener durante largo tiempo sin agotar los recursos.
spanish.example: Necesitamos crear un futuro más sostenible para las próximas generaciones.

english.definition: Able to be maintained at a certain rate or level.
english.example: We need to create a more sustainable future for the next generations.

french.definition: Qui peut être maintenu longtemps sans épuiser les ressources.
french.example: Nous devons créer un avenir plus durable pour les prochaines générations.

korean.definition: 자원을 고갈시키지 않고 오랫동안 유지될 수 있는.
korean.example: 우리는 다음 세대를 위해 더 지속 가능한 미래를 만들어야 한다.

spanish.definition: Tendencia a procurar el bien de los demás de manera desinteresada.
spanish.example: Su altruismo lo llevó a dedicar su vida a la caridad.

english.definition: Disinterested and selfless concern for the well-being of others.
english.example: His altruism led him to dedicate his life to charity.

french.definition: Tendance à se soucier du bien des autres de manière désintéressée.
french.example: Son altruisme l'a conduit à consacrer sa vie à la charité.

korean.definition: 타인의 행복을 위한 사심 없고 이기적이지 않은 관심.
korean.example: 그의 이타주의는 그가 자선에 평생을 바치게 만들었다.

spanish.definition: Que incluye o implica una paradoja.
spanish.example: Es paradójico que tener más opciones a veces nos haga menos felices.

english.definition: Seemingly absurd or self-contradictory.
english.example: It's paradoxical that having more choices sometimes makes us less happy.

french.definition: Qui inclut ou implique un paradoxe.
french.example: Il est paradoxal qu'avoir plus de choix nous rende parfois moins heureux.

korean.example: 더 많은 선택지가 때로는 우리를 덜 행복하게 만든다는 것은 역설적이다.

spanish.definition: Seguridad que tiene una persona de la verdad o certeza de algo.
spanish.example: Habló con gran convicción sobre la importancia de la educación.

english.definition: A firm belief or opinion.
english.example: He spoke with great conviction about the importance of education.

french.definition: Certitude qu'une personne a de la vérité ou de la certitude de quelque chose.
french.example: Il a parlé avec une grande conviction de l'importance de l'éducation.

korean.definition: 어떤 것의 진실성이나 확실성에 대한 개인의 확고한 믿음.
korean.example: 그는 교육의 중요성에 대해 큰 확신을 가지고 말했다.

spanish.definition: Que dura por muy poco tiempo.
spanish.example: La belleza de las flores es efímera.

english.definition: Lasting for a very short time.
english.example: The beauty of flowers is ephemeral.

french.definition: Qui ne dure qu'un temps très court.
french.example: La beauté des fleurs est éphémère.

korean.example: 꽃의 아름다움은 덧없다.

korean.definition: 누군가에 대한 강한 애정이나 애착의 감정.
korean.example: 나는 내 가족을 매우 사랑한다.

english.definition: A strong feeling of affection or attachment towards someone.
english.example: I love my family very much.

french.definition: Un sentiment fort d'affection ou d'attachement envers quelqu'un.
french.example: J'aime beaucoup ma famille.

spanish.definition: Un sentimiento fuerte de afecto o apego hacia alguien.
spanish.example: Amo mucho a mi familia.

korean.example: 아침에 친구에게 '안녕하세요'라고 인사했다.

english.definition: A common greeting in Korean. 'Annyeonghaseyo?' is 'How are you?'
english.example: I greeted my friend with 'Annyeonghaseyo' in the morning.

french.definition: Une salutation courante en coréen. 'Annyeonghaseyo?' signifie 'Comment allez-vous ?'
french.example: J'ai salué mon ami avec '안녕하세요' le matin.

spanish.definition: Un saludo común en coreano. 'Annyeonghaseyo?' es '¿Cómo estás?'
spanish.example: Saludé a mi amigo con '안녕하세요' por la mañana.

korean.example: 도와주셔서 감사합니다.

english.definition: A more formal way to say 'thank you' than 'gomawoyo' or 'gomapseumnida'.
english.example: Thank you for your help.

french.definition: Une manière plus formelle de dire 'merci' que 'gomawoyo' ou 'gomapseumnida'.
french.example: Merci pour votre aide.

spanish.definition: Una forma más formal de decir 'gracias' que 'gomawoyo' o 'gomapseumnida'.
spanish.example: Gracias por tu ayuda.

korean.example: 그녀는 가족과 함께 있을 때 행복을 느낀다.

english.definition: The state of being happy or content.
english.example: She feels happiness when she is with her family.

french.definition: L'état d'être heureux ou satisfait.
french.example: Elle ressent du bonheur quand elle est avec sa famille.

spanish.definition: El estado de estar feliz o contento.
spanish.example: Ella siente felicidad cuando está con su familia.

korean.definition: 어떤 일이 일어나기를 바라는 기대와 열망.
korean.example: 그는 항상 더 나은 미래를 희망한다.

english.definition: A feeling of expectation and desire for something to happen.
english.example: He always hopes for a better future.

french.definition: Un sentiment d'attente et de désir que quelque chose se produise.
french.example: Il espère toujours un avenir meilleur.

spanish.definition: Un sentimiento de expectativa y deseo de que algo suceda.
spanish.example: Siempre tiene esperanza de un futuro mejor.

korean.definition: 잠자는 동안 뇌에서 만들어지는 일련의 이미지, 생각, 감각.
korean.example: 어젯밤에 이상한 꿈을 꿨다.

english.definition: A series of images, thoughts, and sensations occurring in a person's mind during sleep.
english.example: I had a strange dream last night.

french.definition: Une série d'images, de pensées et de sensations qui se produisent dans l'esprit d'une personne pendant le sommeil.
french.example: J'ai fait un rêve étrange la nuit dernière.

spanish.definition: Una serie de imágenes, pensamientos y sensaciones que ocurren en la mente de una persona mientras duerme.
spanish.example: Tuve un sueño extraño anoche.

korean.example: 맑은 날에는 하늘이 파랗다.

english.definition: The atmosphere above the Earth or outer space as viewed from Earth.
english.example: The sky is blue on a clear day.

french.definition: L'atmosphère au-dessus de la Terre ou l'espace extra-atmosphérique vu de la Terre.
french.example: Le ciel est bleu par temps clair.

spanish.definition: La atmósfera sobre la Tierra o el espacio exterior visto desde la Tierra.
spanish.example: El cielo está azul en un día despejado.

korean.definition: 지표면의 대부분을 덮고 있는 광대한 염수.
korean.example: 여름에는 바다에서 수영하는 것을 좋아한다.

english.definition: The expanse of salt water that covers most of the earth's surface.
english.example: I love swimming in the sea in summer.

french.definition: L'étendue d'eau salée qui couvre la majeure partie de la surface de la Terre.
french.example: J'adore nager dans la mer en été.

spanish.definition: La extensión de agua salada que cubre la mayor parte de la superficie terrestre.
spanish.example: Me encanta nadar en el mar en verano.

korean.definition: 서로 애정을 가지고 함께 시간을 보내는 사람.
korean.example: 나는 내 친구들과 영화 보러 갔다.

english.definition: A person whom one knows and with whom one has a bond of mutual affection.
english.example: I went to watch a movie with my friends.

french.definition: Une personne que l'on connaît et avec qui on a un lien d'affection mutuelle.
french.example: Je suis allé(e) voir un film avec mes amis.

spanish.definition: Una persona a quien uno conoce y con quien tiene un vínculo de afecto mutuo.
spanish.example: Fui a ver una película con mis amigos.

korean.definition: 혈연, 결혼 또는 입양으로 연결된 사람들의 그룹.
korean.example: 우리 가족은 매년 휴가를 함께 보낸다.

english.definition: A group of people related by blood, marriage, or adoption.
english.example: My family spends holidays together every year.

french.definition: Un groupe de personnes liées par le sang, le mariage ou l'adoption.
french.example: Ma famille passe les vacances ensemble chaque année.

spanish.definition: Un grupo de personas unidas por sangre, matrimonio o adopción.
spanish.example: Mi familia pasa las vacaciones juntas todos los años.
